context_bundle.summary: RAM-style context index mapping PhiSHRI doors to detailed context files. When door summary insufficient, load corresponding RAM file for full detail.

onboarding.quick_start: RAM files at: C:\Users\Stryker_LOCAL\Documents\context-RAM\. Index: H01-H03 -> Pharmacology.md | P10-P12 -> Consciousness_Philosophy.md | MCP/tools -> MCP_Infrastructure.md
common_patterns: Load RAM only when door insufficient
known_errors: RAM files are conversation-specific - may be stale
Always check door timestamp vs RAM timestamp
RAM files not portable across machines yet
